amendment.description: Amendments comprised of amendments numbered 35, 36, 37, 38, 39, and 40 printed in House Report 114-683. See pages D790 and D791 of the Congressional Record of July 12, 2016 for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: Amendments numbered 35, 36, 37, 38, 39, and 40 printed in House Report 114-683.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McNerney amendments (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 248 (Roll no. 436).

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A032) offered by Mr. McNerney.
